#### Chapter 2

### Ex 2.1

Consider the curve drawn by the price history of the Dow Jones Industrial Average (DJIA) from 1960 to 2010.

```{r echo = T}

getSymbols("DJIA", src = "yahoo", from = "1960-01-01") ## DJIA from 1896

plot(DJIA['1960/2010'], main = "DJIA")

```

```{r echo = T, fig.height=3.5}

getSymbols("AAPL", src = "yahoo")
aplRd <- periodReturn(AAPL, period = "daily")
plot(aplRd, main = "APPLE Daily Returns")
```
